subject: Re: URGENT: update website link North Shore ENT
preview: Good morning,  Received with thanks!  Kind regards,  Siya

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Good morning,

Received with thanks!

Kind regards,

Siya

Hi Siya,

I’ve added your email address as an Administrator user in the WordPress Admin dashboard. You should receive an email shortly with instructions to set up your password.

Please let me know if you need any further assistance!

Hi,

Thank you for your quick response. I would like an editable admin link to the website shared with me with username and password.

Siya

action.text: Victoria Victoria assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Siya,

Thank you for reaching out and for your patience.

You're absolutely right to clarify this, I’ve reviewed your request and understand that you were expecting the website update to be covered under your annual plan. You are currently on the Lite Website Care Plan, which includes 15 minutes of support each month.

It looks like your recent request slightly exceeded that monthly allowance, which triggered the small overage charge of $9. That said, we’ve gone ahead and waived the fee.

We’ve also noted your preference to be informed upfront about any additional costs, we’ll make sure to keep you updated going forward.

Let me know if you need any help.

Hi @victoriaV - lite plan is 15 minutes each month.

It looks like this took them over the plan, so their was an additional charge. If its a small amount (<$50) you have authority to waive the fee and give them context. Leaving with you 👍

Hey @andy, we sent this customer with the overages process that we did.

They're on a Lite Website Care Plan for 1 year, does it cover their previous request?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Victoria Victoria

full_threads.body:
Hi,

I received an invoice recently and not sure why - attached for reference.

As per my understanding and your email below, my previous request for website update should be covered within our annual plan.

Please clarify as I specified in my email to you as below:

Please let me know beforehand if there is an additional cost for this or it's included in our annual payment plan.

I would like you to provide me with a link to edit website, username and password with editing rights on the website.

Siya


Practice Manager
North Shore ENT
Chatswood Specialist Centre
Suite 107, 63A Archer Street
Chatswood NSW 2067

P: 02 9410 3390 | F: 02 9412 1171 | E: practicemanager@northshoreent.com.au
W: https://northshoreent.com.au/



This email (including any attachments) is for the intended recipient's use only. It contains information which may be confidential, and/or protected by copyright. Any personal information in this email must be handled in accordance with the Privacy Act 1988 (Cth). If you have received this email by mistake, please notify us as soon as possible and permanently delete the email. Any confidentiality or privilege is not waived or lost because this email has been sent to you by mistake.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Siya, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://northshoreent.com.au/our-team/
https://northshoreent.com.au/contact-us/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Just following this up.

Thanks,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Pending
Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Tier 2** workflow

full_threads.body:
Hi Siya,

Sorry to hear that and we're here to help.

The issue is that Google has indexed the page, which we'd need to either get access or have it requested to be removed yourself.

You can find your (or create an) account here:
https://search.google.com/search-console/about

Thanks,
Andy

Andy calling Siya to get access to Search Console.
https://search.google.com/search-console/about

They will need to remove the link from Google.
